resources.string: Izberite, kaj se zgodi, ko povlečete epizodo na seznamu
Vključite trajanje epizod, ki so označene kot predvajane
Pozor: hitrost predvajanja se ne upošteva
To bo pobrisalo vso zgodovino pretečenega časa predvajanja vseh epizod. Ali ste prepričani da želite nadaljevati\?
The language is not supported by TTS

In order to successfully play a list of episodes in the background, Podcini needs Permission for Unrestricted Background Activity. Note on some brands, there are sustomized settings for this, please ensure to set them accordingly.
Since Android 13, top level notification is needed for normal refresh and playback. You may disallow notifications of sub-catergories at your wish.
Total size of episodes on the device
POdrobni dnevniki lahko vsebujejo občutljive podatke, naprimer vaše sezname naročnin
This will clear the entire playback history. Are you sure you want to proceed\?
Turn volume for episodes of this podcast up or down: %1$s
You need to create some synthetic feeds first
Ko ne čaka v čakalni vrsti
Please confirm that you want to erase episodes.
Please confirm that you want to delete the podcast \"%1$s\", ALL its episodes (including downloaded episodes), and its statistics.
Please confirm that you want to remove the selected podcasts, ALL their episodes (including downloaded episodes), and its statistics.
Please confirm that you want to remove the podcast \"%1$s\" and its statistics. The files in the local source folder will not be deleted.
Only episodes from synthetic feeds can be erased.
For future reference, you can record a reason here:
Prosimo počakajte, dokler se podatki ne prenesejo.
This will delete all the logs seen here from the database and can not be undone. Are you sure?
Refreshing podcasts over mobile data connection is disabled in the settings.\n\nDo you want to refresh anyway\?

Your VPN app pretends to be a mobile network (metered connection). Refreshing podcasts over mobile data connection is disabled in the settings.\n\nDo you want to refresh anyway\? If you want this problem to be fixed, contact the creators of your VPN app.
Unable to delete file. Try re-connecting the local folder from the podcast info screen.
Choose a tab in the channel
Če želite skočiti na to mesto, morate predvajati epizodo

plurals.name: removed_from_queue_batch_label
plurals.item: %d epizode so odstranjene iz čakalne vrste.

resources.string: Warning: you are deleting local episodes. It will delete the media files from your device storage. It cannot be downloaded again through Podcini. Continue?
Download of \"%1$s\" failed. Will be retried later.
Ni več dovolj prostora na napravi.
Strežnik gostitelja podcasta je poslal pokvarjen vir podcastov.
Strežnik gostitelja podcasta je poslal spletno mesto, ne podcast.
Strežnik gostitelja podcasta ne ve, kje najti datoteko. Morda je bila izbrisana.
Strežnika ni mogoče najti. Preverite, ali je naslov pravilno vpisan in ali imate delujočo omrežno povezavo.
Authentication error. Make sure that username and password are correct.
Strežnik gostitelja podcasta se noče odzvati.
Povezava s strežnikom je bila izgubljena, preden se je prenos končal
Prenosi so blokirani s strani drugih aplikacij na vaši napravi (kot na primer VPN ali aplikacija za blokiranje oglasov).
Unable to establish a secure connection. This can mean that another app on your device (like a VPN or an ad blocker) blocked the download, or that something is wrong with the server certificates.
Prenosi so bili izvedeni z napako.
Na voljo ni bil noben podcast, ki bi ga bilo mogoče prikazati.
Predlagani podkast nima RSS povezave. Podcini je našel podkast, ki modra ustreza.
Downloading over mobile data connection is disabled in the settings. Podcini can download the episode later automatically when Wi-Fi is available.

Your VPN app pretends to be a mobile network (metered connection). Downloading over mobile data connection is disabled in the settings. If you want this problem to be fixed, contact the creators of your VPN app.
Pretakanje preko mobilne podatkovne povezave je onemogočeno v nastavitvah. Tapnite za pretakanje kljub temu.

The media file could not be played.

- Try deleting and re-downloading the episode.
- Check your network connection, and make sure no VPN or login page is blocking access.
- Try long-pressing and sharing the "Media address" to your web browser to see if it can be played there. If not, contact the podcast creators.
Če zaklenete čakalno vrsto, ne morete več premikati ali preurediti epizod.
Potrdite, da želite počistiti čakalno vrsto VSEH epizod v njej
Če se želite naročiti na podcast, pritisnite spodnjo plus ikono.
Auto backup OPML files to Google. Once enabled, after Podcini is uninstalled and re-installed, the subscriptions can be restored. Toggle this setting will restart Podcini.
Automatically back up DB and preferences at a specified interval into a selected folder.
Epizode, ki bi morale biti primerne za odstranitev, če samodejni prenos potrebuje prostor za nove epizode
Začasno ustavite predvajanje, ko se slušalke ali bluetooth odklopi
Nadaljujte s predvajanjem, ko se slušalke znova priključijo
Nadaljujte s predvajanjem, ko se bluetooth znova poveže
Ko se predvajanje konča, skoči na naslednji element čakalne vrste
Choose a custom folder for downloaded media. You can always reset. A restart is needed.
Custom media folder is set. Want to change?
Custom media folder is set. Want to reset to default?
Izbrišite epizodo, ko se predvajanje konča
Include local folders in Auto delete functionality
Note that for local folders this will remove episodes from Podcini and delete their media files from your device storage. They cannot be downloaded again through Podcini. Enable auto delete\?
Removes the episodes from all queues when they are mark episodes as played
Keep episodes when they are marked Super or set as Again or Forever.
Kontrole za slušalke, preskok intervalov, čakalna vrsta
Update interval, Mobile data, Automatic download, Automatic deletion
Specify an interval (in hours, 0 means never) at which Podcini looks for new episodes automatically.
Povezava s slušalkam ali Bluetoothom je prekinjena
Display stream button instead of download button in lists
On metered network, only low quality media (if available) is fetched
Update the progress in an adaptive interval set as the higher of 5 seconds or 2 percent of the media duration. This saves some energy. Otherwise it\'s updated every 5 seconds.
Izberite, kaj naj bo dovoljeno prek mobilne podatkovne povezave
Use full black for the dark theme
Adapt app colors based on the wallpaper
Change which items appear in the navigation drawer
Configure the automatic download of episodes
Dovoli samodejni prenos samo za izbrana omrežja Wi-Fi.
Dovoli samodejni prenos, ko se baterija ne polni
Total number of downloaded episodes cached on the device (0 means unlimited). Automatic download will be suspended if this number is reached.
Set if downloaded episodes already played count into the episode cache
Uporabite naslovnico za posamezno epizodo na seznamih, kadar je na voljo. Če ta možnost ni izbrana, bo aplikacija vedno uporabljala naslovno sliko podcasta.
Prikaži preostali čas epizod, ko je izbrano. Če ni potrjeno, prikaže skupno trajanje epizod.
Prilagodite hitrosti, ki so na voljo za predvajanje s spremenljivo hitrostjo
Hitrost, ki se uporablja pri zagonu predvajanja zvoka za epizode v tem podcastu
Either Speech, Music or Movie for improved processing.
Global generally equals high quality except when prefLowQualityMedia is set for metered network. Quality setting here takes precedence over the setting of prefLowQualityMedia for metered network.
Global equals low quality, Quality setting here takes precedence over the setting of prefLowQualityMedia for metered network.
The queue to which epiosdes in the feed will added by default
Prilagodite informacije o hitrosti predvajanja medijev
Prikazani položaj in trajanje sta prilagojena hitrosti predvajanja
Customize the speed to speed forward when the skip button is clicked
Customize the speed when the play button is long pressed
Prilagodite število sekund za skok naprej, ko kliknete gumb za hitro previjanje naprej
Prilagodite število sekund za skok nazaj, ko kliknete gumb za previjanje nazaj
Choose how video episode is played by default
Swipe down to refresh all subscriptions
When set, Subscriptions view use a grid layout, otherwise list layout
To običajno razširi obvestilo, da prikaže gumbe za predvajanje.
Keep notification and lockscreen controls when playback is paused
Toggle the skip button on the notification panel
Change the playback buttons on the playback notification.
You need an email client installed on the phone.
Najden ni bil noben spletni brskalnik.
Dodajte prenesene epizode v čakalno vrsto
Media files can only be imported after importing the database.
Screen that is opened when starting Podcini
Pressing the back button on the default page opens the navigation drawer
Automatically remove an episode from the queue when it is deleted
Vsakdo lahko pomaga izboljšati Podcini: s kodo, prevodi ali z nudenjem pomoči uporabnikom na našem forumu
Podcini uporablja drugo odlično programsko opremo
Report issues or make suggestions directly to the developer.
Premaknite naročnine in čakalno vrsto na drugo napravo
Prenesite svoje naročnine v drugo aplikacijo za podcaste
Uvozite svoje naročnine iz druge aplikacije za podcaste
Export selectably the database, preferences, media files.
Import selectably the database, preferences, media files.
Prenesite naročnine, poslušane epizode in čakalno vrsto na Podcini, na drugo napravo
Uvozite bazo podatkov Podcini iz druge naprave
Pri branju dokumenta OPML je prišlo do napake:
Transfer Podcini episodes history to a different install of Podcini. Note this is not necessary if you can transfer the DB.
Import Podcini episodes history from another install of Podcini. Note this is not necessary if you already imported the DB.

Importing episodes progress will replace all of your current playing history. You should export your current progress as a backup. Do you want to replace\? If yes, in the next screen, choose the desired .json file. The process can take a couple minutes depending on size. Once completed, a popup of either success or failure will be shown.
Imported subscriptions together with episodes and play history will be added to existing DB. If confirmed, choose a previously exported sqlite database.\"
Importing any of the chosen items will replace those in your current storage. If confirmed, choose a previously exported directory with name containing \"Podcini-Backups\"
Importing preferences will replace all of your current preferences. If confirmed, choose a previously exported directory with name containing \"Podcini-Prefs\"
Choose a previously exported directory with name containing \"Podcini-MediaFiles\"
Imported subscriptions together with episodes and play history will be added to podcini\'s DB. \"
Import a podcasts direcory for offline search. \"
If confirmed, choose a previously exported backup archive from Podcast Addict app.\"
Uvoz podatkovne baze bo nadomestil vse vaše trenutne naročnine in zgodovino predvajanja. Priporočamo, da svojo trenutno zbirko podatkov izvozite kot varnostno kopijo. Ali želite vseeno zamenjati\?
Za branje datoteke OPML je potreben dostop do zunanjega pomnilnika
Pritisnite OK, da znova zaženete Podcini
Previous podcasts subscriptions can be restores. Would you like to restore them?
Neveljaven vnos, čas mora biti celo število
Automatically activate the sleep timer when pressing play
Automatically activate the sleep timer when pressing play between %s and %s
You can connect two devices on the same wifi network to synchronize your episodes play states
Izberite ponudnika preko katerga želite oprviti sinhronizacijo
Izbirate lahko med večimi ponudniki, da sinhronzirate vaše naročnine in epizode
Izberite ponudnika preko katerga želite oprviti sinhronizacijo
Gpodder.net is an open-source podcast synchronization service that you can install on your own server. Gpodder.net is independent of the Podcini project.
Gpoddersync je odportokodna Nextcloud aplikacija, katero lahko enostavno namestite na vaše lastni stsrežnik. Ta aplikacija je neodvisna od projekta Podcini.
You can pick your own server to synchronize with. When you have identified your preferred synchronization server, please enter its address here.

This performs wifi sync between two peer devices. The devices should act as either Host or Guest but not the same. The device acting as Host would have its IP address shown. Ensure to copy that address on guest device. Port number can be changed as needed, but both device should use the same port number. Once confirmed it can not be cancelled. After confirm, maximum time to wait for response on either device is 2 minutes.
Grant access using the opened web browser and come back to Podcini.
Make yourself a Host or Guest first
Please provide the credentials of your account on the synchronization server.
Please select the device that you created on the synchronization server or create a new one.
Čestitam! Vaš račun gpodder.net je zdaj povezan z vašo napravo. Podcini bo od zdaj naprej samodejno sinhroniziral naročnine na vaši napravi z vašim računom gpodder.net.
Spremenite podatke za prijavo za svoj račun gpodder.net.
Synchronize subscription and episode state changes
Ponovno sinhronizirajte vse naročnine in epizode

Logged in as %1$s on %2$s.

You can choose your synchronization provider again once you have logged out
Med sinhronizacijo je prišlo do napake:\u0020
Uporabniška imena lahko vsebujejo samo črke, številke, vezaje in podčrtaje.
Izberite osnovo vaše podatkovne mape. Podcini bo ustvaril ustrezne podimenike.
Začasno ustavite predvajanje, namesto da zmanjšate glasnost, ko želi druga aplikacija predvajati zvoke
Spremenite svoje uporabniško ime in geslo za ta podcast in njegove epizode.
Change the tags of this podcast to help organize your subscriptions
Show this podcast in main list
{faw_info_circle} Only common tags from all selected subscriptions are shown. Other tags stay unaffected.
Seznam izrazov, ki se uporabljajo za odločitev, ali je treba epizodo vključiti ali izključiti pri samodejnem prenosu
Exclude episodes containing any of the terms below
Include only episodes containing any of the terms below
Wide layout on episode list shows larger image, more suitable for video contents.
Vključite osveževanje tega podcasta pri (samodejnem) osveževanju vseh podcastov
Automatically add new episodes in this podcast to the designated queue when (auto-)refreshing
Samodejni prenos je onemogočen v glavnih nastavitvah Podcini
Feeds likely related to the author »

Changing the RSS address can easily break the playback state and episode listings of the podcast. We do NOT recommend changing it and will NOT provide support if anything goes wrong. This cannot be undone. The broken subscription CANNOT be repaired by simply changing the address back. We suggest creating a backup before continuing.
V primeru zavrnitve dovoljenj lahko to uporabite za ponovno povezavo s popolnoma isto mapo. Ne izberite druge mape.
Ta virtualni podcast je bil ustvarjen z dodajanjem mape v Podcini.
Sistemskega upravitelja datotek ni mogoče zagnati
Host ni veljaven naslov IP ali domena
Prikazano, če je vaše dejanje potrebno, na primer, če morate vnesti geslo.
Omogoča nadzor predvajanja. To je glavno obvestilo, ki ga vidite med predvajanjem podcasta.
Prikazano, ko prenos ali posodobitev vira ne uspe.
Prikazano, ko sinhronizacija gpodderja ne uspe.
Videti je, da veliko pretakate. Ali želite, da so na seznamih epizod prikazani gumbi za pretočno predvajanje\?
Videti je, da veliko prenašate. Ali želite, da so na seznamih epizod prikazani gumbi za prenos\?
